info.name: motionblur existing shaders 2
info.description:
Just add this Common to motion blur any shader ( integrating time dithering with procedural white noise. bluenoise would be better but requires setting a texture. ). 
2 variants: basic, & combined with antialiasing.
Attention: will do it on all buffers.
